snippet: The New York Yankees have shuffled their catchers, activating Francisco Cervelli from the disabled list and sending John Ryan Murphy to the minors....

headline.print_headline: Yankees Switch Catchers, Add Cervelli, Drop Murphy
headline.main: Yankees Switch Catchers, Add Cervelli, Drop Murphy

lead_paragraph: The New York Yankees have shuffled their catchers, activating Francisco Cervelli from the disabled list and sending John Ryan Murphy to the minors.
